branchCategory.name: NCG
branchCategory.description: The NCG series is an extremely durable, repairable round body cylinder that provides precision mounting, short overall length, light weight and high speed. Rubber bumpers are standard with an option for adjustable air cushion. Nine mounting styles are available for cylinder mounting flexibility. Bore sizes for the NCG range from 3/4"(20mm) to 2 1/2" (63mm). Standard available stroke lengths from 1" to 12" but with the ability for long strokes. The NCG series is auto-switch capable. The NCG is capable of speeds up to 40 in/sec. The NCG series is available in 11 standard options to help fit into many different applications.

branchItem.name: NC(D)G, High Speed/Precision Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchItem.description: Standard NCG double acting single rod version of the NCG series The NCG series is an extremely durable, repairable round body cylinder that provides precision mounting, short overall length, light weight and high speed.  Rubber bumpers are standard with an option for adjustable air cushion.  Nine mounting styles are available for cylinder mounting flexibility.   Bore sizes for the NCG range from 3/4"(20mm) to 2 1/2" (63mm).  Standard available stroke lengths from 1" to 12" but with the ability for long strokes.  The NCG series is auto-switch capable.   The NCG is capable of speeds up to 40 in/sec.  The NCG series is available in 11 standard options to help fit into many different applications.

branchItem.name: NC(D)GW, High Speed/Precision Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod
branchItem.description: Standard NCG double acting double rod version. The NCG series is an extremely durable, repairable round body cylinder that provides precision mounting, short overall length, light weight and high speed. &nbsp;Rubber bumpers are standard with an option for adjustable air cushion. &nbsp;Nine mounting styles are available for cylinder mounting flexibility. &nbsp;&nbsp;Bore sizes for the NCG range from 3/4"(20mm) to 2 1/2" (63mm). &nbsp;Standard available stroke lengths from 1" to 12" but with the ability for long strokes. &nbsp;The NCG series is auto-switch capable. &nbsp;&nbsp;

branchItem.name: NC(D)GK, High Speed/Precision Cylinder, Non-Rotating, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchItem.description: Standard NCG double acting non-rotating single rod version. The NCG series is an extremely durable, repairable round body cylinder that provides precision mounting, short overall length, light weight and high speed. &nbsp;Nine mounting styles are available for cylinder mounting flexibility. &nbsp;&nbsp;Bore sizes for the NCG range from 3/4"(20mm) to 2 1/2" (63mm). &nbsp;Standard available stroke lengths from 1" to 12" but with the ability for long strokes. &nbsp;The NCG series is auto-switch capable. &nbsp;&nbsp;

branchItem.name: NC(D)G, Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod w/Stroke Options
branchItem.description: NCG dual stroke single rod option (XC11) and dual stoke double rod option (XC10). The NCG series is an extremely durable, repairable round body cylinder that provides precision mounting, short overall length, light weight and high speed.  Nine mounting styles are available for cylinder mounting flexibility.   Bore sizes for the NCG range from 3/4"(20mm) to 2 1/2" (63mm).  The NCG series is auto-switch capable.

branchItem.name: NC(D)G, Cylinder, Single Acting, Single Rod, Spring Return/Extend
branchItem.description: Standard NCG single acting single rod version. Available in spring return or spring extend. The NCG series is an extremely durable, repairable round body cylinder that provides precision mounting, short overall length, light weight and high speed. &nbsp;Nine mounting styles are available for cylinder mounting flexibility. &nbsp;&nbsp;Bore sizes for the NCG range from 3/4"(20mm) to 1 1/2" (40mm). &nbsp;The NCG series is auto-switch capable.

branchItem.name: NCG, Accessory, Mounting Brackets
branchItem.description: NCG series add on mounting brackets for mounting types flange, foot, trunnion, single and double clevis.

branchItem.name: NCG, Accessory, Single Clevis
branchItem.description: NCG single clevis mounting bracket to be used with the "C" mounting option.

branchItem.name: NCG, Accessory, Trunnion / Double Clevis Bracket
branchItem.description: NCG double clevis mounting bracket to be used with the "D", "T" or "U" mounting options.
